translation.en: So, why did I get a perfect score?

translation.en: The test measures your ability to lie.

translation.en: You are a perfect liar.
Don't get me wrong. Perfect liars make perfect spies.

translation.en: The rest we can teach, but subterfuge, that comes naturally.

translation.en: Look, have fun tonight.

Enjoy yourself.
-Okay, what's the plan? -There's security here, here and here.
We'll infiltrate through the rooftop and take out the guards here.

translation.en: and then bungee-jump down to the dance floor.
Okay, check. What next?
"Tell her that you love her." Scud, that's your plan?
translation.ko: '그 애에게 사랑한다고 해' 스커드, 이게 계획이야?

translation.en: -That's not a plan! -War is easy. Love is hard.
translation.ko: - 이건 계획이 아니잖아 - 전쟁보다 사랑이 어렵지

translation.en: Okay, so how's this?
"My tour of duty behind enemy lines,

translation.en: Bravery, loyalty and justice.
And so it is a great honor for me to accept this award..."

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah.
What if she really loves her?
translation.ko: 에이미가 정말 루시를 사랑하면 어떻게 해?

translation.en: I mean, what if Lucy makes her happy?

translation.en: If you were really her best friend, you'd probably let her go.
translation.ko: 네가 정말 제일 친한 친구라면 보내 줘야 해

translation.en: You can't decide matters of the heart.
translation.ko: 마음의 문제를 이성으로 판단할 순 없어

translation.en: It is madness to try.
It's time.
Okay, so I just wrote down a couple words,
explaining our version of what happened
translation.ko: 그때 일에 대해서 어떻게 말해야 할지랑

translation.en: and expressing your gratitude at being honored.

translation.en: And...
I'm sorry that we've been fighting.
It's just I really want what's best for you.

translation.en: I know.
All right. Your speech.
Attention, D.E.B.S.!
Dudes!
Once in a blue moon,

Discipline. Energy. Beauty.
Lucy Diamond's been spotted infiltrating the--
Secure every entrance to this place, every floor.

translation.en: Game over, Diamond.
I have spent my life defending this great country of ours

translation.en: and I have learned one thing:
That sometimes it's not on the battlefield

Amy Bradshaw survived one of the worst tragedies

translation.en: that could happen to a young lady.
Kidnapped,
held hostage,
...for seven terrible days.
-Matthews here. -We're not seeing her.
Look again!
What fears she may have known, none of us can fully appreciate.
translation.ko: 브래드쇼가 어떤 공포를 겪었을지 우리는 모릅니다

translation.en: But she has agreed to tell us part of what she learned,
translation.ko: 하지만 브래드쇼는 당시 배우고 깨달은 것에 대해

translation.en: on her journey.
It gives me great pleasure tonight to give our greatest honor,
translation.ko: 무척 영광스럽게도 저는 우리 아카데미 최고의 상

translation.en: the Mary Jane,
to our very own perfect score
Amy Bradshaw!
translation.ko: 에이미 브래드쇼에게 줄 수 있게 됐습니다

translation.en: Courage.
"Courage" is a big word.
I did not know what courage meant to me
until I endured seven agonizing days in captivity.
translation.ko: 끔찍한 7일을 보낼 때까지 그 진정한 의미를 몰랐습니다

translation.en: Go.
captured and held hostage by a madwoman.
translation.ko: 저는 한 미친 여자에게 인질로 잡혀 있었습니다

translation.en: -Report. -We've got nothing here.
It was a routine mission gone terribly wrong.
I was separated from my squad and knocked unconscious.
translation.ko: 저는 제 동료들과 헤어져 얻어맞아 기절했습니다

translation.en: I awoke in the arms of the enemy.
Just the sound of my own desperate thoughts to keep me company.
If there is corruption in this city, Lucy Diamond is behind it.
translation.ko: 부패가 있는 곳에 루시 다이아몬드가 있고

translation.en: If there is indecency to be found, she is the root.
If there is evil in this world, its name is Lucy Diamond.
translation.ko: 세상에 악이 있다면 바로 루시 다이아몬드입니다

translation.en: It's not until moments like this

that you see what you are made of.
It's not until moments like this
when you have to remember what's right and true
because it's moments like this when you discover
what it truly means to be a D.E.B.
Which is why I can't accept this award from you tonight.
translation.ko: 그래서 전 오늘 밤 이 상을 받을 수 없습니다

translation.en: Because the truth is
the time I spent with Lucy Diamond were the happiest days of my life.
translation.ko: 루시 다이아몬드와 보낸 시간이 제일 행복했기 때문입니다

translation.en: And the only brave thing I've done this whole time
translation.ko: 제가 살면서 했던 가장 용기 있었던 순간은

translation.en: is what I'm doing now.
So if you'll excuse me
I have a date with the devil.

No, that's not in the speech.

Everybody, run for your lives!
Let's do this.
Oh, shit.
-We've gotta stop meeting like this. -I'm so sorry. I didn't even know what--

-Freeze! -Scud!
-Yeah? -Not helping!
-My bad. -Can't you see...
...she's breaking up the D.E.B.S.?
What did I tell you the first time I met you?

translation.en: High-protein diets were overrated.
After that.
-That we'd always be friends. -I meant it.
Max!
If you break her heart, I will hunt you down and kill you.

translation.en: Deal.
I'm counting on you to keep her honest.

I never really liked you but I'm sad to see you go.
-So where are you going to? -I think, Barcelona.

translation.en: I'll miss you.
-Can I have your room? -Sure.

Rule the school.

be careful.

Okay.
